signals.reason: Price is in a short‑term uptrend: last 5 closes rose from 219.221 to 219.598. EMA9 (≈219.55) is above EMA21 (≈219.45). MACD histogram turned positive and the line crossed above the signal, indicating bullish momentum. RSI (≈68) is approaching overbought but still supports upward pressure. Bollinger Bands show price near the upper band, confirming strength. Stochastic %K (~82) above %D (~78) shows bullish divergence. A bullish engulfing candle at 12:16 reinforces the move. All indicators align, giving a confidence above 75%.

Recent candles show higher highs and higher lows, EMA9 is above EMA21, RSI≈58 (bullish but not overbought), MACD histogram turned positive, price is near the upper Bollinger Band yet stays inside, and a bullish engulfing pattern appeared at 12:15‑12:16. All indicators point to short‑term upward bias.

RSI is falling toward 45, MACD histogram turned negative and the line crossed below the signal, price is below EMA9 and EMA21 indicating a short‑term downtrend, Stochastic is descending from overbought levels, the last candles show a series of lower closes and a bearish engulfing pattern, and price is touching the lower Bollinger Band, all pointing to further downside.

EMA9 is above EMA21, price is holding above the 20‑period SMA and near the upper Bollinger Band, RSI ~68 and Stochastic %K above %D in overbought zone but still rising. Recent candles show a bullish engulfing at 12:25 after a short pull‑back, indicating momentum continuation. Trend on 1‑minute chart is mildly bullish, supporting a short‑term long entry.

Останні 8 хвилинних свічок показують послідовність падіння (12:24, 12:25 – bearish), EMA9 перебуває нижче EMA21, RSI < 50, MACD в негативній зоні, ціна торкається нижньої межі Bollinger Bands, Stochastic близько до нижньої межі, що підтверджує переважаючий медвежий тренд при низькій волатильності 0.09%.
